column5: Breaking news from the New York Times:  “A grand jury in Manhattan has indicted Donald J. Trump’s family business the Trump Organization and one of its top executives in connection with a tax investigation into fringe benefits handed out at the company people familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.” That “top executive” is Allen Weisselberg.  The indictment will be unsealed Thursday afternoon; then we get to find out specific charges.   Let’s hope this is just the beginning.
